items.name: Classic Feast Bucket
items.description: A classic feast with 8 Pieces chicken bucket, 1 large fries, 2 small buns, 2 small drinks of your choice, 2 small coleslaws, and 1 sauce of your choice.

items.name: Family Feast
items.description: A family feast with 12 Pieces chicken bucket, 1 large fries, 4 small buns, a 2.25 liter drink of your choice, 2 small coleslaws, and 1 sauce of your choice.

items.name: Party Bird Bucket
items.description: An 18 Piece Hot-Bucket with 2 large fries, 6 small buns, a 2.25 liter drink of your choice, 3 small coleslaws, and 1 sauce of your choice.

items.name: Grand Feast Bucket
items.description: A 22 piece Hot-Bucket with 3 large fries, 6 small buns, a 2.25 liter drink of your choice, 3 small coleslaws, and 1 sauce of your choice.

items.name: Royal Feast Bucket
items.description: A 22 piece Hot-Bucket along with 8 piece hot-bird tenders, 3 large fries, 6 small buns, a 2.25 liter drink of your choice, 3 small coleslaws, our signature Hot Bird sauce and 1 sauce of your choice.
